meanings.definition: A holy war undertaken as a sacred duty by Muslims.
meanings.sent1: The jihads fought in the past were for religious reasons.
meanings.sent2: Many people study the history of jihads in Islam.
meanings.sent3: The idea of animals going on jihads to protect their homes is quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: In the world of business, competition can sometimes feel like a series of jihads.
meanings.sent5: The image of knights going on jihads is often depicted in historical movies.

meanings.sent1: Her daily jihads include trying to eat healthier and exercise more.
meanings.sent2: Everyone faces their own jihads in life, big or small.
meanings.sent3: Trying to resist eating the last cookie can feel like a real jihad sometimes.
meanings.sent4: His journey to overcome his fears was a long and difficult jihad.
meanings.sent5: The character's internal jihad against self-doubt was inspiring to watch.
